content: double pointed needles visual tutorial if using a 16in circ place a marker to denote start of round increase d increase d and join in the round being careful not to twist k knit round 1 rs *k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round optional you k2tog knit 2 stitches together may also work *k2 p2 for this section - both ways look great repeat round 1 until ribbing measures approx 1 5 in / 4 cm from k3tog knit 3 stitches together co edge m1 make 1 stitch see stitch guide body p purl switch to larger needles repeat repeat increase round *k10 m1 repeat from * to end of round 110 round s round s sts 10 sts increase d st s stitch es round 1 *yo k2tog repeat from * to end of round round 2 knit to end of round st st stockinette stitch repeat rnds 1 & 2 for approx 8 75 in / 22 cm from co edge approx 52 rnds ws wrong side yo yarn over crown shaping if using a 16in circ change to dpns as you work the first de- crease round round 1 *k2tog yo k2tog four times repeat from * to end of round 99 sts 11 sts decrease d round 2 & all even rnds knit to end of round round 3 *k3tog yo k2tog three times repeat from * to end of round 77 sts 22 sts decrease d round 5 *k3tog yo k2tog twice repeat from * to end of round 55 sts 22 sts decrease d round 7 *k3tog yo k2tog repeat from * to end of round 33 sts 22 sts decrease d round 9 k3tog to end of round 11 sts 22 sts decrease d finishing cut yarn leaving a 6in / 15cm tall use yarn needle to thread end through remaining stitches pull tight and tie off weave in ends and block yarnster 3
